original_solution_mapping.L1: The colony had 1077 - 129 = <<1077-129=948>>948 penguins in it at the beginning of this year.
original_solution_mapping.L2: At the beginning of the second year, the colony had 948 / 3 = <<948/3=316>>316 penguins in it.
original_solution_mapping.L3: At the beginning of the first year, it had 316 / 2 = <<316/2=158>>158 penguins in it.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, at the beginning of the first year, the penguin colony was catching 158 * 1 1/2 = 237 fish per day.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3755.
    Returns: the number of fish the whole colony caught per day at the beginning of the first year.
    """
    # L1
    current_penguins = 1077 # The colony has 1077 penguins in it now
    gained_this_year = 129 # colony only gained 129 penguins
    penguins_before_gain_this_year = current_penguins - gained_this_year

    # L2
    tripled_factor = 3 # then tripled in the next year
    penguins_beginning_second_year = penguins_before_gain_this_year / tripled_factor

    # L3
    doubled_factor = 2 # size doubled in the first year
    penguins_beginning_first_year = penguins_beginning_second_year / doubled_factor

    # L4
    fish_per_penguin = Fraction(3, 2) # one and a half fish
    total_fish_per_day = penguins_beginning_first_year * fish_per_penguin

    # FA
    answer = total_fish_per_day
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The colony had {current_penguins} - {gained_this_year} = <<{current_penguins}-{gained_this_year}={penguins_before_gain_this_year}>>{penguins_before_gain_this_year} penguins in it at the beginning of this year.

At the beginning of the second year, the colony had {penguins_before_gain_this_year} / {tripled_factor} = <<{penguins_before_gain_this_year}/{tripled_factor}={penguins_beginning_second_year}>>{penguins_beginning_second_year} penguins in it.

At the beginning of the first year, it had {penguins_beginning_second_year} / {doubled_factor} = <<{penguins_beginning_second_year}/{doubled_factor}={penguins_beginning_first_year}>>{penguins_beginning_first_year} penguins in it.
Thus, at the beginning of the first year, the penguin colony was catching {penguins_beginning_first_year} * {fish_per_penguin} = {total_fish_per_day} fish per day.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The colony had 1077 - 129 = <<1077-129=948>>948 penguins in it at the beginning of this year.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: At the beginning of the second year, the colony had 948 / 3 = <<948/3=316>>316 penguins in it.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: At the beginning of the first year, it had 316 / 2 = <<316/2=158>>158 penguins in it.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Thus, at the beginning of the first year, the penguin colony was catching 158 * 158 = 24964 fish per day.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'penguins_beginning_first_year' (158.0) was used instead of 'fish_per_penguin' (3/2).
